house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1958 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.agent_name: Dan & Debbie Valentine, GRI Dan & Debbie Valentine, GRI
